text: Joe Saviktaaq (born December 8, 1960) is a Canadian politician. He is the fifth and current Premier of Nunavut. He was elected Premier on June 14, 2018. He replaced Paul Quassa who lost a non-confidence vote.After Paul Quassa ejected, Nunavut chooses deputy as new premierJoe Savikataaq is the new premier of Nunavut, after non-confidence vote ousts former leader ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of Nunavut
title: Joe Savikataaq
